body_html:
Thank you for the feedback. Generally speaking, tutorials are meant to cover a breadth of topics. Our goal is to show users what's possible and help them get the ball rolling.

Since the DeepDream notebook is very popular, it might be worth going more in depth. I'm not sure if it's something we have time to work on. But I think it's worth asking @znah what he thinks.

body:
Thank you for the feedback. Generally speaking, tutorials are meant to cover a breadth of topics. Our goal is to show users what's possible and help them get the ball rolling.

Since the DeepDream notebook is very popular, it might be worth going more in depth. I'm not sure if it's something we have time to work on. But I think it's worth asking @znah what he thinks.
